system.description: While in a settlement where there are castles or other estates of the nobility, if you have not made yourself unpopular in the community, you can ply your trade as housekeeping or groundskeeping staff. This supports you at a modest lifestyle. While plying your trade in this way, you can Gather Information simultaneously at no penalty. After serving at a given establishment for at least a week, you gain an expertise die on checks related to navigating and recalling lore about that establishment.
